name: Awkwardness Maze 3
description:
Oh hello there fine human    Welcome to Awkwardness Maze 3 Itch.io page of cool fun madness of a game Information

In this game you don't just face the cast a usual 

Everyone you remember is here to

So Challenge the masterminds of Untiy Classics like :

Baldi's basics in education and learning Creepyface's Maze of Dreams and Fun Alex's Basics in Biology and Zoology Baldina's Basis in Literally Grammar  

and Many More

If you're wondering of any plans for future releases well your in luck

i might be secretly planning a 4th game, A version that has a similar gameplay as Baldi's Basics

YEP A NEW VERSION

and thanks for reading
